changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE t_word_learning ( id BIGSERIAL NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY, user_id BIGINT NOT NULL REFERENCES t_user (id), word_id BIGINT NOT NULL REFERENCES t_word (id), learning_type VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, answer_time TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE NOT NULL DEFAULT (now() at time zone 'utc'), answer_duration INTERVAL NOT NULL );
